content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Mary. I am looking for a fair and reasonable rental price that will maximize my gains as a landlord. May I know more about your needs and budget as a tenant?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I'm looking for the lowest price possible. I want to rent the apartment for a year. I am a dependable and responsible tenant, and I am confident that I will take care of the apartment and pay my rent on time. I am willing to negotiate a lower price if necessary. What do you propose?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Mary. Based on the information you've provided, I am willing to offer you a rental price of 800 Euros per month for a one-year lease. This price takes into account the size and location of the apartment, as well as the market rates in Munich. I believe that this is a fair and reasonable price, and I am confident that you will find it to be a good value. Is there anything you would like to discuss further or negotiate?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to negotiate a lower price. I am willing to offer 750 Euros per month for a one-year lease. Is this possible?

Thank you for your consideration.

Sincerely,
Mary Smith
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your offer, Mary. While I am always willing to negotiate, I must inform you that the rental price I initially proposed is based on market rates and the value of the apartment. I am not able to offer a lower price at this time. However, I am open to discussing any additional terms or conditions that may be of interest to you. Thank you for your understanding, and I wish you the best of luck in your search for a suitable rental property.
name: Heinrich Heine
